title: How do i play vs rengar
body: Seriously how do i stop getting 1 shot every game by rengar? -"oh hes weak to cc", kay but as an adc or mid lane with not much cc how can you win vs a champ that can 1 shot you at any time, comes out of no where and just feels like he has absolutely no counter play. i have counted 15 games this week that had rengo in it, the team with him, either mine or enemy just wins; and it's funny to look at the stats after and see how bad rengar's team can do and still win because of him, game after game i can win lane, we can be doing great, but after a certain point the rengo syndrome starts where every thing you step on turns out to be rengar and you instantly die withought being able to do anything. i have never seen rengar doing so well, what changes have they made to him that im unaware of? how do you play vs this shit

replies.body: are we talking about rengar top, or jangle.  in the jingle jangle, you could play {{champion:24}} , hard counter to rengaroni.  in the top lane, you could play {{champion:24}} hard counter to rengaroni

{{champion:107}}  has been buffed with the buff to {{item:3714}}, the extra AD helps his early game ganks a bunch and is truly a snowbally champion. if he can get the early lead, he usually will just snowball from there.

{{item:2043}} will help a lot, ADCs usually hate buying wards, but it's necessary vs {{champion:107}}  teams
{{item:3102}} shield blocks his bola giving him less damage and you can move when he jumps on you

Idfk. If I see Rengar jg on their team and I just picked adc I get a really strong urge to just dodge. Your team legit has to pay close attention to you or your mid, save all of their abilities and hope he doesn't kill you before they kill him (he will). Even if he dies, him taking out the enemy adc ESPECIALLY when his is fed is just gg for a fight.
You wait til he jumps then flash away if you live by some miracle only to be sniped by a minion
